Imagine Hana cooking them nice warm meals where she personalizes them, like making a cutesy design in Toga’s meal, and some of the league gets emotional and tears up the first time they eat her meals bc first off they tasted super delicious and two they probably haven’t eaten a proper meal in months and now someone who is on their side, who is also their healer, is nice enough to take the time to make them a homemade meal that they can come back to when they’re done during their villain stuff!! summary:
**S P O I L E R S**
So I’m re-watching BNHA, I’m at the sports festival arc and the episode where Shouto tells Deku about his...
body:
What’s going to happen?

**S P O I L E R S**

So I’m re-watching BNHA, I’m at the sports festival arc and the episode where Shouto tells Deku about his childhood and etc.

It got me wondering about this panel in chap 217.

Obviously no one else among the class but Bakugou knows about OFA. Deku and Shouto have grown closer and can be seen as legit friends in my opinion. Shouto respects Deku, Deku has helped him accept his fire quirk, etc.

What’s going to happen when Shouto finds out that Deku was lying (keeping this secret) the whole time. How is Shouto going to feel about that? Betrayed, lied to, nothing at all? I’m so fucking nervous 😭

I mean remember when Enji found out about All Mights condition?????!!!!!!!
